resources.string: The unofficial Android client for HackerOne API
Browse reports from common bug types
Need to learn the basics of hacking? HackerOne offers Hacker101 - a free online course about web security.
H1-App is an open source HackerOne API client for Android. This is an unofficial release supported and developed by hafiz.ng
Hafiz Abdulaziz is a bug bounty hunter, penetration tester and Open-source contributor focusing mostly on Mobile Application Security.
Ranking is calculated based on reputation earned.
